channel.title: The Deprogram
channel.itunes:author: JT, Hakim, and Yugopnik
channel.description: What do an Iraqi, a Balkan Slav and a Texan have in common? A burning hatred for the system. Oh, and a podcast. Say no to eating out of the trash can of ideology. Join us on a journey exploring and critically assessing the perceived “normalcy” of late-stage capitalism. The only truly international, global, and anti-capitalist podcast you’ll find. SUPPORT US on PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/TheDeprogram FOLLOW US on Twitter @TheDeprogramPod

item.itunes:summary: You are listening to this episode 1 week after it was released. To get episodes on time check out our Patreon! Episode 106 is already available there: https://www.patreon.com/TheDeprogram Come hear from special guests from Decolonize Palestine in this almost 2-hour long chat! Be sure to check out their work and other Palestine-related resources at the links below: https://decolonizepalestine.com https://www.newarab.com/Comment/2017/9/4/Israeli-hummus-is-theft-not-appro...
item.description:
You are listening to this episode 1 week after it was released. To get episodes on time check out our Patreon!  Episode 106  is already available there: https://www.patreon.com/TheDeprogram

Come hear from special guests from Decolonize Palestine in this almost 2-hour long chat! Be sure to check out their work and other Palestine-related resources at the links below:

https://decolonizepalestine.com 

https://www.newarab.com/Comment/2017/9/4/Israeli-hummus-is-theft-not-appropriation

Documentary Recommendation - 1948: Creation and Catastrophe (now on YouTube)

https://x.com/emanabdelhadi/status/1721930566075818455?s=46&t=ERcLpeeXXA8a90OmqMuOcQ

https://www.palestine-studies.org/en/node/1650088

https://via.library.depaul.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=1587&context=jatip

Support the show

Support the show on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/TheDeprogram
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheDeprogramPod

item.title: Episode 81 - Cuban Solidarity With Calla And Shaquille
item.itunes:summary: Come listen to NNOC co-chairs Calla Walsh and Shaquille Fontenot talk about meeting the Cuban president, getting detained in the States, and organizing to get Cuba removed from the State Sponsors of Terrorism list! Learn more about the campaign: nnoc.org/offthelist NNOC’s socials: twitter.com/NNOCuba, instagram.com/nationalnetworkoncuba All info about NNOC, solidarity travel to Cuba, political education resources and more can be found on the NNOC website: ...
item.description:
Come listen to NNOC co-chairs Calla Walsh and Shaquille Fontenot talk about meeting the Cuban president, getting detained in the States, and organizing to get Cuba removed from the State Sponsors of Terrorism list!

Learn more about the campaign:

nnoc.org/offthelist 

NNOC’s socials: 

twitter.com/NNOCuba, 

instagram.com/nationalnetworkoncuba 

All info about NNOC, solidarity travel to Cuba, political education resources and more can be found on the NNOC website: 

nnoc.org

Register for the online conference:

https://redworldreview.org/international-conference/

Support the show and help us grow while staying as independent as possible. Earn plenty of bonuses - Discord community, early episodes, exclusive bonus episodes, live monthly hangouts, and plenty more.

item.itunes:summary: Today we continue our tradition of talking about events and philosophy from different parts of the world - with reputable Marxists from those parts of the world. Joined by Diego Ruzzarin we tackle Jan 8th in Brazil, Cartels, Socdems in South America, Marxism, Spinoza and much more. Please check out Diego's work on the following platforms: Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/diegoruzzarin Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/diegoruzzarin/?hl=en Facebook: https://facebook.com/dieg...

item.itunes:summary: Keeping with the promise of the idea behind this show - we're bringing you local leftist voices to talk about what's going on in their corner of the world. Today we're joined from Moscow by renowned Russian journalist - Konstantin - to talk about the current state of his part of the world and beyond. Straight from the bear's mouth. Check out Konstanin's work on Youtube here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2qoLqo8RuV4P_88yhHCZIg His Twitter: https://twitter.com/KSyomin Episode...

Keeping with the promise of the idea behind this show - we're bringing you local leftist voices to talk about what's going on in their corner of the world. Today we're joined from Moscow by renowned Russian journalist - Konstantin - to talk about the current state of his part of the world and beyond. Straight from the bear's mouth.

Check out Konstanin's work on Youtube here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2qoLqo8RuV4P_88yhHCZIg

His Twitter: https://twitter.com/KSyomin

item.itunes:summary: New episode and new format?? Tell us what you think - once a month overview of the news we think you should and shouldn't care about. We're calling it Send New(d)s. item.itunes:title: Episode 36 - Let Them Eat Cake (JT's Juicy Dumptruck)

item.description:
Today we're joined by our first RETURNING guest - the fantastic Alan MacLeod.  We take a deep dive into one of his most recent articles and discuss the escapades of the world's (arguably) wealthiest man - weapons, taxes, satellites and rock stars turned state department propagandists - this episode's got it all. 

Please check out his fantastic work here:

His Twitter: https://twitter.com/AlanRMacLeod/

His Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/alan.r.macleod/

His Recent Articles: https://www.mintpressnews.com/author/alan-macleod/ 

MintPress News: https://www.mintpressnews.com/

The Articles discussed in the episode:

https://www.mintpressnews.com/elon-musk-not-renegade-outsider-cia-pentagon-contractor/280972/

https://www.mintpressnews.com/frontman-empire-bono-activism-serves-powerful/281017/

The next episode, Episode 36 - Let them eat cake (JT's juicy dumptruck)  is available NOW 1 full week early on Patreon:  https://www.patreon.com/TheDeprogram
Bonus Episode 7: Gamers is also available exclusively on Patreon.
Support the show, get bonus episodes, early releases, discord access and a lot more by donating: https://www.patreon.com/TheDeprogram

item.title: Episode 27: When Life Gives You Yemen, Give Yemen Aid
item.itunes:summary: A big brain lecture on Yemen by Hakim-san. Let's try to actually learn something about one of the arguably most forgotten parts of the world, at least in the "west". We dive into Yemen's history, culture, and unfortunately, the war that's been raging there for far too long. The next episode, Episode 28: Orientalism, Cultural Imperialism and Nic Cage is available 1 full week early on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/TheDeprogram Bonus Episode 5: The Deprogram W...

A big brain lecture on Yemen by Hakim-san. Let's try to actually learn something about one of the arguably most forgotten parts of the world, at least in the "west".  We dive into Yemen's history, culture, and unfortunately, the war that's been raging there for far too long.

Episode 21 is now available 1 week early on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/TheDeprogram

For a country sold to us as being "gray" for decades - the Soviet Union was one of the most diverse places on the planet. We're joined by Lady Izdihar in discussing the successes and mistakes of the worlds largest internationalist project to date. 

Please check out her fantastic work here:

item.description:
The Deprogram Episode 16 is now available 1 week early on Patreon at: www.patreon.com/TheDeprogram

Brain Drain. Migration, always talked about, but never by actual migrants. What happens to the countries people migrate to? Incessantly debated. What happens to the ones people leave? Unmentioned. 

The boys give this one an international review.

Support the show, get recognition, early episodes, bonus episodes and access to our discord server by donating over on Patreon.

Support the show

Support the show on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/TheDeprogram
